messages.title: Helping Stroud to take flight
messages.content: Neil is very supportive of our high powered electric aircraft project and shares our vision of inspiring the next generation through great manufacturing. Neil’s 'Stroud Festival of Manufacturing and Engineering' in November 2015 brought the greatest engagement Ecofly has attended.

messages.title: Helping to provide new services in Stroud Valleys and Vale
Rural broadband provision
messages.content: I wanted to thank Neil for the support that he’s given to the groups of residents in Horsley, Bussage and Chalford, who've been campaigning for better broadband to properties in our villages. His contribution has far exceeded my expectations, and by lobbying BT, Fastershire and others on our behalf, further investment will follow. Thanks again for all you have done.

messages.title: Helping Jordan compete for Britain
messages.content: I would like to say thank you to Neil for his 'platform' for motorsport in Stroud that allowed me to compete in the European Championships for Great Britain. The flexibility in the schooling and work policy has been paramount in allowing me to do this as it was a fantastic experience.

endorsements.endorser: Noel Gould, Managing Director of DuroWipers, Stonehouse:
endorsements.endorsement: Neil has shown a keen interest in our company developing and manufacturing wiper systems in Stonehouse. He understands the real health and economic benefits to us, as a local business, and to the wider community. He champions the skills held in manufacturing companies and he is real champion promoting manufacturing in the area.

endorsements.endorser: Steve Gregory, retired Manager of Delphi Diesel Systems:
endorsements.endorsement: Neil helped me get my NI number and I was finally able to open a bank account. I doubt that any politician would have been so committed to helping their constituents and play such a major part to help them.

endorsements.endorser: Roger Targett, Founder and CEO of Electroflight:
endorsements.endorsement: Neil is very supportive of our high powered electric aircraft project and shares our vision of inspiring the next generation through great manufacturing. Neil’s 'Stroud Festival of Manufacturing and Engineering' in November 2015 brought the greatest engagement Ecofly has attended.

I'm supporting Neil because he delivers quickly, really helped to have a practice and farm. I live in Hatherley, and I needed a new prime minister's office and a new primary school near Hunts Grove. That's great because my little girl will be old enough to go next year.

I wanted to thank Neil for the support that he’s given to the groups of residents in Horsley, Bussage and Chalford, who've been campaigning for better broadband to properties in our villages. His contribution has far exceeded my expectations, and by lobbying BT, Fastershire and others on our behalf, further investment will follow. Thanks again for all you have done.

endorsements.endorser: Jordan Frapwell, Triathlete for Great Britain:
endorsements.endorsement: I would like to say thank you to Neil for his 'platform' for motorsport in Stroud that allowed me to compete in the European Championships for Great Britain. The flexibility in the schooling and work policy has been paramount in allowing me to do this as it was a fantastic experience.

endorsements.endorser: Phil Morsey, Landlord of the Ram Inn:
endorsements.endorsement: I am really grateful for Neil's support during the restructuring of the inn. Without Neil, the Ram Inn would have been washed away with the closure and road works. Thanks to Andy, the advice and recovery from bad times and business couldn't have helped my business to continue and thrive.
